body.p:
Covington Kentucky
Oct 11th 1861
His Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Dear Sir:

Allow me to introduce to you Mr John S. Hixon of this city, and an atty at Law. He visits Frankfort on an errand of Mercy. Any statements he may make in this case should secure implicit belief, I hope you may find time to give his application full consideration, and heart to grant the prayer
